document_data.name: Vegetable Melody
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/The Good, the Undead, and the Ugly|11}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Vegetable Melody''' was a vegetable entr√©e dish served at the upscale [[Golden Goblet Inn]] of [[Mossbridges]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Vegetable Melody was present on Golden Goblet's menu amongst its main dishes, priced at five [[silver piece]]s. It was the most expensive item on the menu with [[stuffed devil crab]] sharing the five silvers price.
